footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xiangling | Update Date: 02/06/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Wavebreaker's Fin__
The higher the team's Elemental Burst costs, the stronger this weapon becomes. 

__The Catch__
The free weapon with everything she needs. Go fishing if you don't have it.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Staff of Homa, Engulfing Lightning, Deathmatch, Dragon's Bane, Skyward Spine, Staff of the Scarlet Sands, Vortex Vanquisher, Kitain Cross Spear, Ballad of the Fjords, Prospector's Drill, Missive Windspear, Moonpiercer

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus% |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Pyronado
**2)** Elemental Skill: Guoba Attack
**3)** Normal Attack: Dough-fu

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Generally, Xiangling requires around 180% ER. Her main source of damage Pyronado, has a hefty 80 burst cost.

If the weapon isn't HP%, and she has enough Energy Recharge, almost all weapons will work on Xiangling.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xiangling | Update Date: 08/21/2022 | Editor: kitkat#1305

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Staff of Homa, The Catch (R5), Engulfing Lightning, Deathmatch, Wavebreaker's Fin (R3), Lithic Spear, Favonius Spear

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or ATK% |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Pyronado
**2)** Elemental Skill: Guoba Attack
**3)** Normal Attack: Dough-fu

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Generally, Xiangling requires around 180% ER. Her main source of damage Pyronado, has a hefty 80 burst cost.

Elemental Mastery is not needed in Mono Pyro compositions due to the lack of reactions.
